om.tnavigator.reports
Interface OmTestReport

All Known Implementing Classes:
HomeTestReport, MoodleFormatReport, QuestionTestReport, UserTestReport, VariantsTestReport
public interface OmTestReport

Interface for Om report plugins. A new instance of the report class is generated each time the report is run.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getReadableReportName()
           
 java.lang.String getUrlTestReportName()
           
 void handleTestReport(UserSession us, java.lang.String sSuffix, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
          Generate the report, sending it to response.
 boolean isApplicable(TestDeployment td)
           
 

Method Detail

handleTestReport

void handleTestReport(UserSession us,
                      java.lang.String sSuffix,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Generate the report, sending it to response.

Parameters:
us - The user's session on this test.
sSuffix - The remainder of the URL.
request - The request being responded to. It is recommended that you only use the values obtainable from getParameterMap. The URL will have been consumed in getting this far. Autentication and cookies should be checked using methods of NavigatorServlet.
response - The response we are sending.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getUrlTestReportName

java.lang.String getUrlTestReportName()
Returns:
The part of the URL that means the servlet should run this report.

getReadableReportName

java.lang.String getReadableReportName()
Returns:
a human-readable name for this test report. Return null if you don't want this report listed at the bottom of the HomeTestReport.

isApplicable

boolean isApplicable(TestDeployment td)
Parameters:
td - The test deployment.
Returns:
whether this report is applicable to this test.
